entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as leaning out of the back window of an old turquoise car, grinning at Harry from the front seats.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are described as grinning at Harry from the front seats.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as talking to Ron through the bars of a window.

entities.name: the ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as being involved in issuing official warnings for using magic in front of Muggles.

entities.name: old turquoise car
entities.description: The old turquoise car is described as being parked in mid-air.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are talking to each other through the bars of a window.
Ron's father works for the Ministry.
Harry and Ron are friends, as evidenced by their conversation.
Fred and George are Ron's elder twin brothers.
